</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Toggles stress damage in [[Description.ext#forceRotorLibSimulation | Advanced Flight Model]], which otherwise could be manually toggles in game setting: <tt>Options</tt> - <tt>Game</tt> - <tt>Helicopter Flight Model</tt> - <tt>Advanced</tt> - <tt>Stress Damage</tt>.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature AFM</title></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>'''enableStressDamage''' state</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> state: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to enable stress damage, [[false]] to disable it </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[difficultyEnabledRTD]]) [[then]] { [[enableStressDamage]] [[true]] };</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>



</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>[[Description.ext#forceRotorLibSimulation | forceRotorLibSimulation]], [[difficultyEnabledRTD]], [[isStressDamageEnabled]]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
